summary.span: 创建让用户能够调用 ASP.NET 事件处理程序的用户界面元素，并提供将用户输入从 UI 元素回发到服务器的方法。

span.span: Creates a user interface element that enables users to invoke ASP.NET event handlers and it provides a means to post user input from UI elements back to the server.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在请求设备上显示为交互式 UI 元素。The control displays as an interactive UI element on the requesting device. UI 元素的标签来自从 基类继承的属性 。The label of the UI element comes from the property, which is inherited from the base class. > [!CAUTION] > 避免在 ASP.NET 移动网页 Url 中使用特殊字符。Avoid using special characters in ASP.NET mobile Web page URLs. 为将事件投递回服务器而生成的 HREF 标记 `Command` 并未严格验证。The HREF tags generated for posting `Command` events back to the server are not strictly validated. 例如，包含空格的 URL 会导致生成 WML，而不能由某些 WML 浏览器处理。For example, a URL that includes spaces results in the generation of WML that cannot be handled by some WML browsers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何附加命令事件。The following code example demonstrates how to attach command events. 单击任一按钮会 引发 事件。Clicking either of the buttons raises the event. 用户定义函数使用 `CommandEventArgs` 参数查看单击了哪个 按钮。The user-defined function uses the `CommandEventArgs` argument to see which button was clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/VB/default.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the specified control causes server-side validation to occur on all controls on the form; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要使验证在窗体上进行，必须使用引发验证的控件提交窗体，且必须将其 属性设置为 `true` 。For validation to occur on a form, the form must be submitted with a control that raises validation, and must have its property set to `true`. 控件目前是引发验证的唯一控件。The control is currently the only control that raises validation.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件激活时，它会引发 事件。When a control is activated, it raises the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的 "特定于设备的呈现" 和 "设备特定的行为" 部分 。For more information, see the "Device-Specific Rendering" and "Device-Specific Behavior" sections in . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何附加命令事件。The following code example demonstrates how to attach command events. 单击任一按钮会 引发 事件。Clicking either of the buttons raises the event. 用户定义函数使用 `CommandEventArgs` 参数查看单击了哪个 按钮。The user-defined function uses the `CommandEventArgs` argument to see which button was clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileCommandExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileCommandExample/VB/default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过枚举访问两个可用的类型 。Access the two available types through the enumeration. （默认值） (default) 此命令以按钮形式呈现。The command is rendered as a button. 此命令呈现为链接。The command is rendered as a link. > [!NOTE] > 属性 仅在支持 JavaScript 的设备上支持该值，如属性所示 。The property supports the value only on devices that support JavaScript as indicated by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以链接或按钮的形式呈现命令。The following example demonstrates how to the use the property to render the command as a link or a button. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code example uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性不为 ，并且设备可以处理图像按钮，则 控件将使用图像而不是按钮或链接文本。If this property is not and the device can handle image buttons, the control uses the image instead of a button or link text.

Protected Overrides Function IsFormSubmitControl () As Boolean

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否提交窗体。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the control submits the form.

summary.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

returns.span: 如果控件提交窗体，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the control submits the form; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移动控件（例如 ）可以重写此方法，以确定它是否是用于提交窗体的控件。Mobile controls, such as the , can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission. 可以通过提供逻辑以编程方式确定是否必须提交控件（例如，通过检查特定属性）来扩展其他控件。Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be submit controls, for example, by checking for specific properties. > [!NOTE] > 仅当控件实现 捕获回发事件的方法时，才会将控件视为窗体提交控件。A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements method to capture the postback event. 否则，即使方法返回，也不会为默认事件处理程序注册 `true` 。Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.

span.span: Introduction to the Command Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ItemCommand As CommandEventHandler

summary.span: 在用户选择与 项关联的命令时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user selects a command that is associated with an item.

summary.span: 此 API 已废弃不用。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义事件处理程序后， 当通过用户交互生成项事件时，控件将通知处理程序。When an event handler is defined, the control notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction. 与 事件不同， 事件向上冒泡到父控件。Unlike the event, the event is bubbled up to the parent controls. 事件呈现特定于设备，并且在的 "设备特定的行为" 部分中进行了详细介绍 。The event rendering is device-specific and is discussed in detail in the "Device-Specific Behavior" section of . 事件 在事件之后引发 。The event is raised after an event. 在每次单击命令按钮时重复相同操作集的方案中，可以使用 控件的或 属性 来标识用户单击的命令按钮。In a scenario where you repeat the same set of actions each time a command button is clicked, you can use either the or property of the control to identify which command button the user clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将 事件用于页面上的多个命令。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event for multiple commands on a page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileItemCommandSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileItemCommandSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileItemCommandSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileItemCommandSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]

value.span: 显示软键时使用的标签。

span.span: The label used when a soft key is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅用于支持软键的设备。This property is used only for devices that support softkeys. 如果该属性为空，则 使用控件的属性。If this property is empty, the property of the control is used. 如果 属性为空或其长度小于9，则将 属性用于软键标签。If the property is empty or its length is less than 9, the property is used for the softkey label. 否则，如果显示) ，则该单词 `Go` (。Otherwise, the word `Go` (if it is a submit control command) is displayed. 属性的值 被截断为12个字符， (软键) 的标准最大长度。The value of the property is truncated to 12 characters (the standard maximum length of a softkey).

span.span: Introduction to the Command Control
